tool_description: Access to the  New Zealand Business Register, official government source - ideal for KYB
name: New Zealand Company Data
title: New Zealand Company Data

api_list.name: Searchbycompanyid
api_list.description: This endpoint can be used to look up a new zealand company by it's ID - i.e.  9429040402543 for Air New Zealand
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://new-zealand-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/default/NZ/entities/9429040402543"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "new-zealand-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://new-zealand-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/default/NZ/entities/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "new-zealand-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Searchbycompanyname
api_list.description: This API endpoint can be used to search for a New Zealand company by it's name - ideal for KYB solutions
